summary: This document appears to be a transcript of a deposition or interview with a correctional officer, Ms. Noel, regarding her work at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). She discusses being out on injury from approximately March 15 to June 24, 2019, and being directed by a supervisor to sign training documents for a period she was not working. The testimony also covers her assignment to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) upon return and questions about specific training.

persons.name: Ms. Noel
persons.context: A correctional officer at the MCC who was out on injury from approximately March 15 to June 24, 2019, and was directed to sign training documents for that period upon her return. She was assigned to the SHU in the summer of 2019.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: A supervisor at the MCC who directed Ms. Noel to sign training documents for a period when she was out on injury, specifically telling her not to date the documents.

persons.name: Mr. Foy
persons.context: An attorney present during the deposition who provides clarifying information, such as the approximate dates of Ms. Noel's injury leave (March 15 to June 24, 2019).

connections.description: The Lieutenant, as a supervisor, directed Ms. Noel to sign training documents for a period she was not working.
Mr. Foy appears to be representing or advising Ms. Noel, as he references reviewing discovery and conversations with her to provide information.

events.title: Ms. Noel's Injury Leave
events.description: Ms. Noel was out on injury leave from her duties at the MCC from approximately March 15 to June 24, 2019.

events.title: Signing of Backdated Training Documents
events.description: Upon returning to work in June 2019, Ms. Noel was directed by a supervisor to sign training documents for the period she was on leave. The supervisor told her not to date the documents.

events.title: SHU Assignment
events.description: After returning from injury leave in June 2019, Ms. Noel was assigned to work in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the MCC until at least August 10, 2019.

locations: FCI Fort Dix (mentioned as current location of the Lieutenant)
keyFacts: A correctional officer, Ms. Noel, was directed by a supervisor to sign training documents for a period (March-June 2019) when she was out on injury leave and not working.
The supervisor specifically instructed Ms. Noel not to date the training documents she was signing.
Ms. Noel did not receive specific SHU training but reviewed post orders upon her assignment to the unit in June 2019.
The testimony suggests a practice of having employees sign for training they did not actually receive, though Ms. Noel stated she did not know if this happened to others.
